summary: Landing page UI/theme and tel: links were added, and the generated image paths are referenced. However, some required exact text/labeling appears missing (especially displaying the full “Order Now: 9919031626” string), and unrequested authentication/backend scaffolding (Internet Identity, actor hooks, backend canister) was added, conflicting with the static/no-auth constraints. Image asset files under public/assets/generated are not evidenced in the diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Display the ordering instruction exactly as “Order Now: 9919031626”.
missing_requirements.reason: In App.tsx, the order CTA renders as “Order Now” (without showing the number). The required exact combined text is not shown in the visible diff content.

missing_requirements.requirement: Label both phone numbers clearly so users can distinguish general contact vs ordering.
missing_requirements.reason: The main number is shown as just “9919031636” in the header without a visible label indicating it is the general contact number; the order CTA is labeled “Order Now” but does not display the number, making the distinction/labeling requirement only partially met based on the diff snippet.
App.tsx references the required image paths, but the diff summary does not show any added files under frontend/public/assets/generated, so existence cannot be confirmed from the provided diff.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration (AuthClient/DelegationIdentity provider and related context).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly disallows third-party authentication/external services and specifies a static informational site with no user accounts/authentication; the diff adds Internet Identity auth plumbing.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend canister/actor scaffolding and authenticated/anonymous actor creation via react-query.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest is for a static site with no backend calls required; diff adds backend actor infrastructure and hooks that imply backend interaction/auth flow.

hallucinated_features.description: Social media icon dependencies/usages (react-icons) and additional contact UI elements (Mail/MapPin imports).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest requirements; adds extra UI/features beyond the specified title/founder/phone/order instruction scope.
